comment.author: 10799299@N00
comment._content: Probably also more men who had something to do with the Harry Thaw escape conspiracy trial. William Gordon was a hotel proprietor who testified that the defendants stayed at his hotel before the escape. His nephew, Gordon Dike, also testified. select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F20D15FC395B1773... The other two I'm not sure about. One of the defendants was Michael O'Keefe not William but maybe the label is wrong.
